"『Annihilator Purification』":
"Your mission objective is to purify
multiple waves of [Magatsu]
, utilizing the 「A.I.S. v2.0」
within the time limit."

"These [Magatsu] differ in properties,
and have unique attributes.

Work quickly to identify each one's
effective weaknesses."

"A word about the [Result Summary] window:

The rewards of this mission are dependent
on the number of [Magatsu] purified within the time limit.

Strive to attain a high ranking through teamwork."
